segments.text: I am sorry , but I can't stay until the end of class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where do you need to be that is more important than school ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have a plan to make up your missed work ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but I'll make sure someone helps me out this week with my missed work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you going to go right away ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , but please remember that it is your responsibility to catch up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , Professor . I'll make sure everything gets taken care of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Goodbye , and try not to miss any more school .
segments.speaker: S2
